trans-unit.source: Represents the activity class used to handle an <xref:System.Exception> of the type specified by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity.FaultType*> property.
trans-unit.target: 表示活動類別，用來處理<xref:System.Exception>所指定型別的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity.FaultType*>屬性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity.FaultType*> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"></xref>類別使用的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: activityName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityName為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets the <xref:System.Exception> that is being handled by this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Exception> associated with this instance.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned if the activity did not handle any exceptions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果活動並未處理任何例外狀況傳回的。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the <xref:System.Type> of the exceptions to be handled by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得並設定<xref:System.Type>處理的例外狀況的<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity"> </xref>。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Exceptions of the type derived from the type specified in FaultType are also handled.
trans-unit.target: 也會處理例外狀況型別衍生自 FaultType 中指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity>.
The <xref:System.Type> of the associated <xref:System.Exception>.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity.FaultType*> property.
This property is read only.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Provides a value that indicates whether this instance can filter on the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 提供值，指出這個執行個體是否可以篩選指定<xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Type>.
The value that determines whether an exception is raised on an error.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否發生錯誤時引發例外狀況的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Type> can be filtered; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以篩選<xref:System.Type>;，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>否則。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets the filter description associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個執行個體相關聯的篩選描述。

trans-unit.source: The filter description associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體相關聯的篩選描述。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
To be added.
Returns the access type for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之屬性的存取類型。

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時期用來驗證是否屬性正確繫結至另一個。

trans-unit.source: Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這個介面是直接從屬性 getter/setter 推斷這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用於實作<xref:System.IServiceProvider>來提供設計階段服務的存取，如有必要。</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"> </xref>代表屬性存取層級的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Type> of the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時期用來驗證是否屬性正確繫結至另一個。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用於實作<xref:System.IServiceProvider>來提供設計階段服務的存取，如有必要。</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
The for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱會當做傳遞 propertyName 參數。
